SEARCH
Module pizzeria.pizzeria
Package model

Class Order

java.lang.Object
model.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents a customer's order, containing a list of pizzas and providing functionality to add, remove, and calculate costs. Each order is assigned a unique order number. Author: Belwin Julian, Suhas Murthy

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order()
    Constructs a new Order with a unique order number.
